reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"ATAC-130 Gunship (ATAC) is a flying tower notable for its patrol movement. Contrasting other stationary tower units, ATAC circles the area around which it was deployed. ATAC rarely sees use anywhere as it costs too much for what little value it provides to the team.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVE, ATAC is not worth using at all. In general, offensive debuffs (like DEF shred) are preferred over the defensive debuffs that ATAC provides. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVP, ATAC sees next to no use due to its prohibitively high cost; 5 DP cost is a dealbreaker when ASSRs contribute significantly more value at similar cost. However, its properties make it an interesting unit that sometimes sees play once in a blue moon:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Positional Advantage: Tower units naturally provide a positional advantage (for more detail see: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.prydwen.gg/counter-side/guides/rta-concepts"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"value":"https://www.prydwen.gg/counter-side/guides/rta-concepts","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"). ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Role-Typing Advantage: As a Flying [Mech] [Tower] unit, ATAC dodges the majority of anti-X DMG% gear commonly used in PVP. This gives it unreasonably high survivability against most ground damage threats.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"On UP, ATAC sees limited use in teams that synergize with it (e.g. Abraham Mech comps).","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Relatively tanky in a PVP environment, owing heavily to the gear metagame.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.description: Periodically travels around its deployment spot, attacking enemies and occupying a certain range.

introduction.introduction:
A strategic aircraft that provides an area buff at the deployment location, while continuously dealing damage to the enemy.

　It is a support gunship commissioned in the mid-20th century, widely known as the Angel of Death. Equipped with a 120mm mortar, it orbits the operation area to provide fire support.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Repeatedly travels a certain distance sideways, firing at Ground enemies and inflicting DoT damage.
Suppresses enemies from the air, decreasing HIT and EVA by 30% for enemy Ground units within range.

level5.level5: Passive debuff also decreases enemy Ground units' ATK by 15%

baseDescription.baseDescription: Dominates the air, increasing ATK by 10% for Air units within range.

level5.level5: Passive buff also decreases Air units' DMG Taken by 10%

baseDescription.baseDescription: Improves its flare performance, so as to increase its survivability while turning. Temporarily increases DMG RES by 10% while turning.
